thread.title: Mom "rattled" by Southwest's biracial son query

title: Mom "rattled" by Southwest's biracial son query
text:
Mom "rattled" by Southwest's biracial son query 11:38am EDT - 01:02
UC Berkeley women’s head basketball coach Lindsay Gottlieb says Southwest Airlines asked for proof that her biracial baby was hers before they'd allow her to board a fllght.. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
UC Berkeley women’s head basketball coach Lindsay Gottlieb says Southwest Airlines asked for proof that her biracial baby was hers before they'd allow her to board a fllght.. Linda So reports.
